title: Home Beats Hardware Electronic Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. The people here at Apple don't just build products — they build the kind of wonder that's revolutionized entire industries. It's the diversity of those people and their ideas that encourages the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple and help us leave the world better than we found it. The In Region EE HW Engineer, you will work on the next generation home/beats innovative products. You will be part of an extraordinary EE team, acting as the team's local representation at manufacturing sites in China.
description: The role involves working with manufacturing teams and RD colleagues to design, validate and optimize hardware circuits and systems on home/beats products from first prototype build to mass production, requiring proactive multi-functional collaboration with other engineering groups such as other EE teams, FW, production test etc. Define and implement validation plans for HW Sub-system such as power DC-DC, I2C, USB, SPI, DDR etc. Debug and tackle hardware and interfaces. Make our excellent products even better! A significant part of the job activities will take place at the manufacturing sites - international and domestic travel is likely.
key_qualifications: Experience in design and development of high speed digital and/or analog boards and systems on consumer products. Must have a deep understanding of the system development process including concept creation, schematics and board development, as well as board and system bring up and debugging. Hands-on and proficient with lab equipment: digital multi-meter, spectrum analyzer, signal generator, oscilloscope, power supply, E-load, etc. Good communication skills with both English and Chinese for global teamwork. Should be well team work and accept mid/long-term travel in a changing work environment. Proven to be able to work independently under high pressure and comfortable working in dynamic environment. Software and scripting experience is a plus.
